column4: I'm trying to install (from source) a program that tells me I need "gtk+-2.0", but what do I need to install (using synaptics) in order to have gtk+?
will libgtk-3.0 be enough or do I also need the -dev version?
you need the -dev versions to compile against - but not sure about the 2 vs 3 issue.
